list_definition.definition: at the present period of time

list_ex_of_english: Whether we like it or not, digitally generated sound is the most pervasive musical material nowadays.
Nowadays a great number of plasma mixtures have come into extensive use in a variety of industrial and engineering applications.
In the subsequent decades part-time childcare was further reduced and is nowadays virtually non-existent.
Nowadays, several fragments are well conserved but others undergo selective logging and cattle grazing.
These are all things which are rarely appreciated nowadays.
His prodigious output of writings, chiefly on classical subjects, which during his lifetime commanded a good deal of respect, is rarely read nowadays.
Nevertheless, the output of those mints was very small and most of these coins, particularly in gold, are rarities nowadays.
Roads and bridges were built and there is now easier contact between places; outsiders and tourists pass through nowadays.
